attributes.action: stop Royal Mail from closing the Post Office in Poland Street, Soho
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Royal Mail is on the brink of closing the only post office in Soho, forcing customers to use a new facility in the WH Smith in Oxford Street, some distance away.
This would put local residents and businesses to great inconvenience, and take away a community facility, thus further eroding the social fabric of Soho.
